name: Star Wars: Knights of the Old Republic

files.game: N/A:Please select the GOG.com Windows installer

content:
files:
- game: N/A:Please select the GOG.com Windows installer
game:
  arch: win32
  exe: drive_c/GOG\ Games/Star\ Wars\ -\ KotOR/swkotor.exe
  prefix: $GAMEDIR
installer:
- task:
    description: Creating Wine prefix
    name: create_prefix
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- task:
    args: /SP- /NOCANCEL /SUPPRESSMSGBOXES /NOGUI /DIR="C:/game" /LOG="C:\log.txt"
      /LANG=en
    description: Installing...
    executable: game
    name: wineexec
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
